inn1.comm: play and a miss outside off stump, good start from Siddle
short of a length, Tharanga drops the ball at his feet and briefly thinks of a quick single, wisely decides against it
bouncer! And a pretty well-directed one, it's hit Tharanga on the shoulder as he ducks out of the way
good line on off stump, Tharanga angles the bat and guides to gully
beaten outside off, it was a touch wider than we've seen so far and Tharanga chased it with a defensive prod
straight-bat defence from Tharanga
left alone outside off
beaten outside off, it's a good length ball and Dilshan tried to push through cover, that did not miss the edge by much
left alone outside off, just a hint of away swing from McKay, who is hovering around the 130-133kph area
driven towards mid-off but Dilshan hasn't timed that
no shot offered, this one is a touch straighter and sails over the off stump
crunched off the back foot towards point and Dilshan can't beat the field
pushed away defensively to cover
what a way for Sri Lanka to get off the mark! It's short, Tharanga has quickly picked up the length and lifts a pull in the air over square leg, one bounce and over the boundary.
pushed away to mid off
angled across the left-hander, who drives and can't beat mid off
on the hips, Tharanga works it away to midwicket and picks up a single
good delivery, that one nips back in to Dilshan, who cops it in the midriff
good line, just outside off, and Tharanga defends
half-volley outside off, Tharanga drives but can't beat mid-off
once again McKay angles it across Tharanga, once again the batsman drives to mid-off
right on line and pulls the length back a little, Tharanga defends
Tharanga gets sick of driving to the fielder, this time he's lifted McKay over mid-on but doesn't time it, the ball drops dead in the outfield and they pick up two
that's a very similar shot, another mistimed aerial drive that only just clears mid-on, that's a dangerous shot if you don't get it right
great shot! That's a crunching square drive from Dilshan, he's thrown everything at that and it's sailed over point and away to the boundary at speed.
beautiful work from Dilshan, he's attacked a half-volley from Siddle and driven through cover, again perfectly timed and placed, finding the gap
driven towards mid-off and this one doesn't beat the field
good yorker, right on line, and Dilshan keeps it out
beaten outside off, good ball that nips away just a fraction
short of a length now, Dilshan cuts to third man
play and a miss, good ball from McKay, nipping back in to the right hander with decent bounce
good running - Dilshan guides it away to third man off the face of the bat and Siddle has a bit of ground to cover, they get back for two
Dilshan goes for a walk! Premeditated stuff to the medium-fast McKay, but checks his shot and defends
on the back foot, Dilshan cuts hard but straight to point
short of a length again, Dilshan cuts fine towards third man
slower ball, driven to mid-on
short ball, the batsmen doesn't chase it
clipped away to square leg and Hussey misfields, to allow a single
full and wide of off, Tharanga does well to clamp the bat down on that and angle a single down to third man
slashed hard outside off and it flies in the air through gully! There's nobody there, though, and it bounces down to third man
tightens up the line a bit here, Tharanga defends
Tharanga backs away and tries for the big aerial drive back past the bowler, again he hasn't timed it properly and mid-off chases to keep that to two
good seam movement from McKay, jagging back in to Dilshan, who waits on it and cuts to third man
bouncer and right on line, Tharanga ducks safely underneath it
width from McKay and Tharanga pounces, he makes that cut shot look easy, all the way along the ground and dead straight through point, well played
same shot, but this time Ponting dives across and gets a hand on that, which takes the pace off it and allows Clarke to chase it down inside the boundary at deep point
Tharanga dances down the pitch and looks for another slash through off, he's missed the ball though
McKay comes around the wicket now and Tharanga works the ball to midwicket
angles in to the off stump, Tharanga defends
crunched through cover for a boundary! There's a man at short cover, it's Cameron White, and this ball has sailed past him in the air but it was absolutely smoking, he had no chance of catching that
Dilshan slashes outside off and misses
oh, Dilshan is really targeting Johnson here! He's got a little width outside off and lifts that over point, gives it everything he's got and it's bounced just inside the boundary
Dilshan winds up for a big swing again, but this time checks his shot and pushes to mid on
a bit straighter now, Dilshan works it away to third man
Johnson doesn't adjust his line for the left-hander, this one sails down leg side for a wide
well played by Tharanga, he waits on this outside off and cuts behind gully
angled in from around the wicket, Tharanga guides it off the face of the bat to third man
worked off the hips for a single to square leg
Tharanga walks at McKay and tries to slam it through the off side, but doesn't time it and short cover fields
good ball, angled in to the off stump, and Tharanga defends it respectfully
worked away to midwicket, can't beat the field
and McKay's decent over finishes with a not-so-good ball, short and on the leg stump, Tharanga pulls it fine but the fielder from inside the circle manages to run back and haul it in at fine leg
angled bat from Dilshan, who guides it behind point
width outside off, Tharanga cuts to third man
short ball now, Dilshan pulls in the air, one bounce to deep midwicket
straighter line this time, Tharanga defends
worked away through square leg
pushed away to point and can't beat the field, Johnson is hovering around 140-145kph
drifts onto the pads, Tharanga can't get it away
Tharanga advances, again it's on the pads and he can't get bat on ball
drifts down leg, Tharanga misses his sweep and it's called a wide
Tharanga dances down the track and mistimes it through midwicket
ah, good turn from Hauirtz, Dilshan tries to cut a ball that's too full and turns in and under his bat
wider outside off, cut to deep point
tickled off the pads and they get back for two leg byes
pulled through midwicket and Hussey in the outfield collects
Dilshan winds up but can't get it past mid on
on the pads, Dilshan clips it through midwicket and just gets the single to Hussey in the deep
fullish and on off stump, Tharanga drives to cover
bad ball, down leg side by a long way
yorker on line, that's much better from Johnson and Tharanga keeps it out
short outside off, Tharanga leaves it
turns in towards off, Dilshan opens the face and guides it for a single
oops, Tharanga advances to Hauritz and the defends, and slips over in the process, he's lucky that didn't get past him
drifting in from around the wicket, it's defended
short, pulled, four. Hauritz had bowled okay, but this releases all the pressure - too short and Tharanga gets back to pull in the air between midwicket and mid-on, bounces over the boundary
cut away to point
again Tharanga skips down the wicket, Hauritz fires it into the pads
powerful shot from Dilshan, he's launched a muscly cover drive in the air but safely away to the boundary, just a little width from Johnson and Dilshan pounced
straighter line, Dilshan drives to cover
a bit slower at 134kph, Dilshan guides it through point
fullish length and straight, Tharanga defends
shorter outside off, Tharanga cuts behind point
pushed away to cover and can't beat the field
on the pads again, Tharanga nudges a single to mid-on
quicker and wide of off, turns in and Dilshan cuts comfortably through point
Dilshan guides to backward point, can't beat the field
ah, edged and beats Haddin! In fact that's been called byes. But there was a definite edge there as the extra bounce surprised batsman and keeper, it's ricocheted off Haddin's glove to third man
pushed away through point
Tharanga tries for the pull, but it's too full and he checks the shot to midwicket
some turn for Smith, Dilshan cuts it away through point
good shot, a nice deft touch from Tharanga, who cuts very fine with no slip in place
shortish and turning away from the right-hander who cuts a single through point
clipped away off the pads behind square leg, runs are coming very comfortably here
cut forward of point this time, Dilshan is finding the gaps with ease
driven in the air wide of mid off, Tharanga didn't get hold of that one as he would have liked
turned away off the pads
Dilshan's taken that one from a long way outside off and paddled it around behind square leg, effective but just gets a single
howzat? Haddin is up immediately for a caught-behind appeal down leg side, Marais Erasmus is not convinced and calls it a wide
drifts even further down leg this time, Haddin takes it well but that is a wide every day of the week
nudged out through cover
tossed up outside off, Dilshan works a single through point
angled in from around the wicket, Tharanga defends
driven down to long-off for yet another single
shortish and spinning in to Tharanga, who cuts hard to deep point, for yet another single
fullish ball, driven back to the bowler
drifts in to the leg stump, Dilshan defends
too short from Smith, Dilshan cuts hard to deep cover
turned off the pads to square leg
tossed up outside off, Tharanga winds up and drives in the air over wide cover, picks up a couple of runs
beaten outside off, and that's been rare lately, Dilshan played for the turn and it went straight on
flicked away to midwicket
Dilshan waits on this one nicely, cuts late to short third man for a single
cut hard by Tharanga, McKay dives across at backward point and makes an effective, if ungainly save

finally Hauritz makes the breakthrough! Dilshan has gone for an aggressive sweep to a fullish delivery that doesn't turn much, Dilshan opened up his stance and was struck right in front, Marais Erasmus sends him on his way
defended away to the leg side
guided away to third man off the face of the bat
nudged away off the hips defensively
beaten outside off, Jayawardene hangs the bat out at that one
defended away safely from a straight line
Jayawardene is watchful here, defending outside off
straight-bat defence once more
nice drift in to the left hander from around the wicket, Tharanga with soft hands works it to square leg
Mahela's off the mark with a gentle clip through square leg to a straight ball
another good pull from Tharanga, who steps back to make the ball a bit shorter than it was, right off the middle and it bounces over the rope at wide midwicket
defended back to Hauritz
ah, lovely batting from Tharanga, who advances and lofts a boundary over mid-on, a chip shot really, that rolls to the rope
worked away through point
short ball from Siddle, Tharanga pulls but mistimes this one, and it's collected at deep midwicket
solid in defence outside off, Jayawardene remains watchful
pushed to cover, can't beat the field
Jayawardene tries to lift this one over leg, it's off a thickish inside edge behind square leg, not quite where he wanted it to go
good length on off stump, Mahela drives to mid-on

banged in short and Jayawardene pulls, rolling the wrists perfectly to get the ball straight into the turf and it's fielded at deep midwicket, Siddle needed to get his bouncer further up around head height instead of chest
swings in to off stump at 125kph, Mahela defends
Jayawardene liked the look of the speed of Watson's first delivery, he's walked down the pitch and lifted this one over midwicket to the man in the deep
clipped off his pads for a single
Watson strikes! Jayawardene went for the pull to a ball that didn't get up as much as he expected, Erasmus gives him out. At first glance the height looked like an issue, but Mahela's gone.
defended towards point
beaten outside off! Good ball, a teasing length and angling across Sangakkara, who plays and misses
cut off a thickish edge to where a second slip might have been, but there's just the one slip in
left alone outside off
driven through cover, finds the gap nicely
driven to mid-off, where Johnson is quite deep, and they scramble a single, Johnson's throw misses the stumps but Sangakkara was safe in any case
a punchy drive now, back past the bowler, but not timed well enough to reach the boundary
left alone outside off
pushed away defensively to cover
cut away behind point for another single
Sangakkara winds up for a drive, but can't beat cover
no shot offered, a good line just outside off
Watson's at 119kph here, hard to say it's the slower ball as his pace has not been quick at all, and that's left alone
clipped away off the pads and deep square leg collects
driven back past the bowler but can't get a single
nudged through cover and they take off for a quick single
Tharanga advance and looks for a big pull, the top edge sails over slip and is fielded at third man
angled across Sangakkara, who gets a thick edge away through gully
cut away behind point and the singles keep coming
shortish ball and it's cut through point for another run
driven to mid-on, can't find the gap

lovely shot, Sangakkara's first really terrific stroke today, he plants the front foot down the pitch and drives through the line, in the air but safely wide of the bowler and that was four from the moment it left the bat
thickish edge away to point
left alone outside off
shouts of 'catch it' now, Sangakkara drives on the up and the man at short catching cover nearly gets a chance, but it's sailed just wide of him
driven away defensively to off
drifts down leg side and that's a wide, Tharanga doesn't connect with his sweep

oh, is that dropped? That's a pretty tough chance. It drifts in from around the wicket, a thick inside edge onto the pad lobs out to where slip would have been, Haddin dives at full stretch and gets his left hand on it, but it doesn't stick
defended back to the bowler
single pushed to mid-off
clipped away off the pads to deep square leg
Hauritz really tosses this up and gives it some air, it's driven down to long-on
soft hands from Sangakkara, who bunts towards cover and takes off for a quick single
terrific shot from Sangakkara, he's cut that hard and perfectly placed behind point, the two men at deep cover and third man converge and between them manage to cut off the boundary
pushed away defensively
Sangakkara drives off the middle of the bat but straight to long off
driven back to the bowler, who does the fielding
cut away behind point
good ball, pitched on off an seaming away just a touch, it's beaten the outside edge
pushed away to cover defensively
Hauritz curves it in to the middle stump, Sangakkara drives back to the bowler
a little too leg-sidey from Hauritz, Sangakkara dabs a sweep around the corner
ah, this one turns, Hauritz has been drifting them in without much spin, this one turns past the bat of Sangakkara, though he was well inside it
driven to cover
punched to cover again and can't beat the field
driven along the ground down towards long-off, the runs keep ticking over pretty easily for Sri Lanka
clipped away to midwicket
rank full toss and that gets what it deserves. Watson's sprayed it across the left-hander it's around waist height, Sangakkara flays at that and gets it away to deep point
cut to point, White does the fielding
soft hands, it's clipped away through square leg and that's really good running, turned that tight two into a pretty comfortable two by running the first very hard
left alone outside off this time
cut to point, can't get it past White
short ball and outside off, cut away safely wide of third man
140kph, angling in to Tharanga, who defends
Tharanga is struck on the pads, would have drifted down leg
goes for the pull this time but doesn't time it, there's a real clunky sound as that one runs away through midwicket
fuller length and wide of off, it's driven through the gap at cover for an easy two
Tharanga gets some width outside off and throws the bat, it sails safely over cover and bounces to the man in the deep
angled across Sangakkara, who pushes a drive through cover
Watson is around the wicket now, and Tharanga drives against the angle, for a quick single to mid-off
a bit slower at 120kph, Sanga looks to drive through cover but clunks it down into the turf
walks down the pitch and pulls it wide of midwicket, gets another single to the man in the deep
nudged away through cover
defended on the leg side
pushed to long off for a single
swept on one knee behind square
Sangakkara comes forward, makes room and lofts a flighted delivery to the extra-cover boundary
played watchfully off the front foot towards long off
tossed up with a lot of air, Tharanga drives through the gap at cover
There's width outside off stump and Tharanga drives fluently through cover
Sangakkara attempts a risky single and Tharanga would have been in trouble ad there been a direct hit
Tharanga attempts a waft outside off and is beaten
pushed on the off side for a single
the slower ball, on a good length outside off, Sangakkara tries to steer towards point and gets beaten
Sangakkara charges and flays his bat at a wide delivery outside off, he can't make contact
Tharanga waits for the ball to angle into him and then opens the face to steer to third man
full and straight from Johnson, Sangakkara clips it off his toes through square leg. They want two, he hasn't timed it well and the fielder running to the ball has to cover a lot of ground.
Sangakkara slaps a short of a length ball over cover with a lovely flourish of the bat
Tharanga tries to run the ball towards third man but can't connect
Johnson cramps Tharanga for room and the left-hander brings his bat down late to drop the ball on the off side
Johnson slips down leg side, Sangakkara misses the flick
Sri Lanka are batting with urgency now, Sangakkara drives towards point and runs as he plays the shot

hilarious scenes! Sangakkara inside edged the attempted cut to Haddin on the bounce, Tharanga set off for the single, Sangakkara sent him back, both batsmen were at one end. Haddin lobbed the ball high and slowly to the bowler's end, it sailed over Watson's head at the stumps and was collected by Clarke behind the bowler. Tharanga was still yards and yards out. Clarke could have ambled to the stumps and taken off the bails. Instead he chose to throw, and Watson was standing right in front of his stumps. The ball hit Watson instead of the stumps and Tharanga gets an unbelievable let off
beaten outside the off side
played towards third man for a single
steered to third man again for a single
short of a length outside off stump and Sangakkara slashes hard towards the third man boundary
caught on the square third man boundary! Sangakkara reaches out and slashes once again, this time he's not controlled it well and slices it high towards McKay, who moves to his left to hold the catch
edged wide of the fielder at slip for more runs
defended on the back foot
Mathews tries to drive down the ground but gets a thick outside edge towards point
Johnson targets the blockhole and Tharanga digs it out on the leg side for a single
driven on the up off the back foot through cover
scooped in the air but short of mid-off, where McKay mis-fields
what a good shot, he's backed away a little to make the ball wider than it was, and cut hard in the air forward of point, beats the man at deep cover
fuller and angling in, Tharanga drives hard outside off and can't connect
on the hips, it's worked away through square leg
short of a length, Mathews on the back foot punches to cover
well wide of off, Mathews tries to drag it to leg and gets an under edge, takes off for a quick single
on the hips again, it's tucked away through square leg, some confusion there as Mathews thinks about coming back for a second and Siddle is quickly on to the ball to prevent it
wide of off and drags it to leg, as there is nobody on the on-side boundary, but doesn't time it and mid-on gets across to make the save
Mathews backs away, McKay follows him with a slower bouncer that does the job, not too high and forces Mathews to duck it
this time Mathews goes for the pull to the shorter ball and gets hold of it, bounces away to deep backward square leg for a boundary
well played by Mathews, again backs off to give himself room and slaps a shortish ball back over McKay's head, mid-off runs around to cut off the boundary
bad ball, good shot, it was slow and short on leg, Mathews shaped for the pull and had time to adjust to the speed off the pitch, swivelled it over the man at short fine leg, well played
McKay follows Mathews to leg, he's driven it back down the ground, collected at long-on and a wide throw allows the batsmen to get back for two
Tharanga backs off and Siddle follows him, it's pulled to the man at deep square leg

inn2.comm: right on line immediately, 141kph, Watson defends to cover
sprayed well wide of off, called as such as Sangakkara takes it in front of first slip
good ball, shaping away from Watson and skidding through, it beats the outside edge
fullish on off, Watson drives to mid-off
thickish edge along the ground past gully, third man collects and Watson is off the mark
good line, Malinga is attacking the stumps, which is a sensible move with a wet ball, and Haddin defends
clipped off his pads through midwicket
got him! Perfect start for Kulasekara! He's got the ball to seam back in and Haddin's looking for an aggressive drive, it gets through the gate and rattles his stumps
swinging in towards the stumps, Ponting's big stride gets him outside the line and it lobs off bat and pad behind square leg
on the pads again, Watson can't get it away
left alone outside off
angled bat from Watson, he guides it to third man
attacking the stumps again, it's driven to mid-on
waits on that one and guides it to third man, Watson's started out quite cautiously
ooh, Ponting brings the bat down from outside off and defends, off a thickish edge, Malinga keeps targeting the stumps
down leg this time, Ponting gets it away off his thigh
outside off, Watson clunks it down into the ground and it bounces over gully to give him a single
clipped off his pads through the gap at midwicket, nice placement to pick up a couple
Ponting defends a ball that bounces a bit more than he expected
there's the first boundary of the innings, Watson gets one on his pads and lifts it through midwicket, just a well-timed flick, really
shortish outside off, Watson cuts and third man does the fielding
this one jags back in from short of a length, Ponting works it to point
again it moves in to Ponting, who defends
nips in to Ponting once more, he takes that one on the body
lovely shot, that's one of Ponting's favourites, a back-foot drive just forward of point that rolls away over the damp outfield and just makes it to the boundary
banged in short of a length and on line, Watson waits on it and guides it into the ground to slip
yorker, good ball just a fraction off line, Watson defends
tries the yorker again, down leg this time and Watson glances it fine for a couple of runs
Watson goes for it now, he's lifted this one off the stumps over midwicket, but in the wet outfield it stops with a thud, good shot all the same

there's a boundary, probably a little lucky there for Ponting as he goes for a pull and the ball runs off his gloves just wide of the diving Sangakkara, runs away to fine leg and barely makes it into the rope
oh, a much better bouncer! Fast and on line, Ponting tries to hook and the ball sails over his bat through to the keeper
Watson works this off the face of the bat behind point
this time Watson defends
worked away off the pads
right on line from Kulasekara, Watson defends
this one nearly gets through, stays a bit low and Watson gets bat on ball, dropping it at his feet for a single
punched away to cover and can't beat the field
on line immediately, Watson defends
Watson waits on this one and guides it to third man, he's played that shot a lot so far this innings
Ponting takes a big stride forward to defend
on the back foot, Ponting defends
the pull shot brings Ponting undone! He hasn't got that one quite off the meat of the bat, it's a sort of toe-edge that flies high to deep midwicket, where Silva runs around to take the catch
Watson pushes to point and can't beat the field
Clarke defends watchfully to leg
defended safely from outside off
short of a length and angling in to Clarke, who punches to cover
defended at his feet, Clarke thinks about a cheeky single and decides against it
driven on the bounce to the man at short cover
nips back in to Clarke, who defends
Watson drives uppishly towards mid-on
oh, ripper! What a good ball from Perera, it jags back in and bounces sharply, sails between Clarke's inside edge and midriff, and over the top of middle stump
a little inside edge onto the pad now
Clarke still can't get off the mark, he's driven that square to point and the Sri Lankans are sharp in the field, looking to build the pressure on Clarke
he's off the mark, but not convincingly. A thick inside edge has run to short fine leg and they take off for a quick single that would have been tight but for a fumble by the fielder
there's Watson's favourite shot tonight, the angled bat guiding it to third man
driven to mid-off, can't beat the field
on the back foot, Watson punches to cover
driven straight back to the bowler
nearly gets through Watson with a good ball that seams back in
cut away safely behind point
clipped to midwicket, can't find the gap
there's a big wind-up from Watson, he tries to slap it over the leg side and the ball moves away from the bat, past the outside edge
nudged wide of cover for a single
attacking the stumps again with a fullish ball, Clarke pushes and wants a single past the bowler, but Perera gets a hand on it
thick inside edge onto the leg, again Clarke can't find a run

is this a wicket? Oh, just safely over the man at mid-off! The pressure has been building on Clarke, he's tried to force this one over the infield and doesn't time it well, Malinga at mid-off runs back a little and the ball sails just over his outstretched arms. I reckon he could have got there, he was just slow off the mark
defended away safely
gets that one away for a single

Clarke decides to make something happen, and it comes off! Walks down the pitch a little and picks this one off his pads with a lovely clip over deep midwicket, it's timed so well that it clears the boundary
another good shot, Clarke punches off the back foot through the small gap at cover, well played
Watson attacks this time, but his drive isn't quite timed and is collected at long-on
good yorker, but Clarke has walked down the pitch a little and makes it a full toss, works it through cover
driven wide of cover, Clarke picks up a single
Clarke advances immediately, and drives Murali to long-on
outside off an not much turn, it's pushed away to gully
flatter and quicker, turning to leg stump, and Watson clips it behind square
this time it's Clarke who hits with the spin, working a single through square leg
that's a powerful shot for one, Watson gets down on one knee and sweeps along the ground off the middle of the bat, but straight to deep midwicket
well fielded, Clarke got that off the middle but couldn't get it past the infield

what a shot! That's the best way to take the slow outfield out of the equation - clear the boundary instead! It was shortish and Watson gets on the front foot to hook it over square leg, flat and long

hmm, what's happened here? Watson looks to work it through leg and a leading edge has flown past Sangakkara for a boundary to third man, the bowler and Sangakkara launched a big lbw appeal but Erasmus rightly calls that as runs off the bat
punched away through point
Clarke tries to force this through midwicket, on the up, and it's knocked down by the fielder, allowing a single
clipped off the pads to deep square leg, they pick up two
defended safely back down the pitch
wonderful shot, it was a bad ball from Murali, short and outside off, Clarke gets back in his crease and crunches that through cover, finds the gap easily
Clarke dances down the pitch and drives to long-on
shortish again from Murali, Watson pulls through square leg to the man in the deep
Clarke uses his feet again and flicks a drive to long-on

that's gone! Watson gets down on one knee looking for the slog-sweep, he's been hit in line and the ball was turning, but only a little, Bruce Oxenford says that's out, and it looked like a good decision at first glance
Murali comes around the wicket to White, who defends
right on line, Clarke defends
Clarke goes the pull this time, but doesn't get hold of it quite as he would have liked
nudged to point, can't beat the field
on the back foot, White punches to long-on to get off the mark
short of a length from Perera, who's bowling well, Clarke defends

Murali, you beauty! Another big wicket as Clarke launches an aggressive pull, gets a top edge and Muralitharan at third man runs around to his left and takes the catch while falling towards the ground
left alone outside off
turns away from the left-hander, Hussey pushes a quick single to point
that's a delicate paddle sweep from White, and he's actually hit it into Sangakkara, who was moving to his left to cut it off, the ball still gets away for a couple of runs
clipped through midwicket off the pads
pushed away through cover for a single
doosra, and White hasn't picked it, he plonks the bat down in front of the stumps and the ball runs away to gully off his leading edge
tip and run from White, who gets a single to cover
short of a length, Hussey pulls in the air through square leg but there's a man in the deep
right on target, aiming at the stumps, and White defends
on the back foot now, White crunches a drive through cover
great shot, and wonderful fielding, Hussey square drives to point and Dilshan hurls himself to his left to make a save, that'd hurt the hands in this cold weather
pushed to cover and can't beat the field
on the pads, White works it behind square leg
pushed to the gap at cover for a single
pushed to point, can't beat the field
White leans forward and nudges to mid-on
down leg side, White pushes a single through square leg
drifting on to the pads, Hussey works it through midwicket
on the pads, Hussey drives through midwicket and thinks about a couple, he can't get back though
full toss way outside off, White drives and gets a couple to deep cover, but he'd have liked to put that one away properly
another fullish wide ball, White drives to deep point and that's good running to get back for two
ooh, beaten outside off
this one gets through, a fullish ball that White has played over, lucky not to be bowled there
turned through midwicket for a run
on the pads, knocked to midwicket
that's a very quick and tight single, White clips to short fine leg and Hussey hares through to make his ground
pushed away defensively
nudged to leg off the pads, can't find a run
driven to cover, can't beat the field
on the stumps now, Hussey goes a long way back in his crease to clip this through midwicket
Hussey goes the big sweep, hasn't connected and there's half an lbw shout but Randiv is around the wicket and that would have skidded down leg
same again, but this time Hussey connects and gets a single to short fine leg
quicker and flatter, White launches a slog sweep over midwicket's head - just - and it's swept up by the man on the boundary
clever stuff from Hussey, he gets a low full toss just outside off and goes the reverse sweep, just helping it on its way, it's chased down inside the third-man boundary
a gentle drive to long-on from White
good shot, and poor fielding, Hussey swivels a pull down leg side and Mathews at short fine leg misfields what he should have stopped, giving away four runs
angled across White from around the wicket, he deftly nudges forward of point for a quick single
big appeal for lbw, but Oxenford shook his head immediately, from around the wicket that did look to be heading down leg

Hussey's gone! Murali strikes! Hussey advances down the pitch and tries to loft it over mid-off, but there's a man in the outfield there and Mathews takes the catch. It was a strange, half-hearted sort of shot, Hussey needed to really go for that to clear the boundary and he seemed to check his shot
nudged to mid-on for a single
Smith pushes to cover defensively
Smith goes the drive to long-on and gets off the mark
fullish outside off, Smith drives to long-on
edged and some fortunate runs there for White, that has gone very fine through where a slip would have been, he was going for the straight drive
beaten outside off, played for the turn that wasn't there
flatter on the pads, Smith turns a single to midwicket
pushed to mid-on and can't beat the field
driven back down the pitch
advances down the pitch and flicks straight to the man at midwicket
Smith waits on this one and works it with soft hands behind square leg
White clips it forward of square, they get back for two
angled across White, who drives just past the diving short cover
Smith sweeps this from on middle stump, along the ground to deep fine leg
a little bit quicker, it's pushed to cover and they can't find a run
pushed to cover for a single
pushed off the back foot to cover, they want a single but can't justify it
fullish outside off, Smith punches that off the back foot through point
lovely ball, that's an inswinging yorker dead on target, and Smith does well to keep that out
tries the yorker again but this one is down leg, strikes Smith on the pad and he gets a leg bye
oh boy! White had no idea about that! It was the slower yorker this time, after two quick ones, and White only survived because that was a fraction wide of off stump
Smith waits on this one and turns it through square leg for a single
good shot from White, he lifts this one over extra cover and the ball lobs in the outfield to allow two runs
prodded back towards the bowler
White dances down the pitch and thinks about the slog, but then checks it and pushes a single to long-on
flicked away behind square leg
again White advances, again he checks it and pushes to long-on as Randiv drags his length back
swinging in and just short of yorker length, White flicks it over midwicket for a couple
the slower yorker again, this time it's on line and White only just adjusts his shot in time, pushing to cover
slower ball at 126kph, Smith waits for it and guides to gully, can't find a run
slower yorker again, he's got it on line and Smith defends
three slower balls in a row, so the quick bouncer was always on the cards, but it was too high for Smith, and it's called a wide
another slower ball, this over has been full of them, and Smith can do nothing but nudge that down into the ground off the toe of the bat
fullish outside off at 128kph, Smith pushes a single forward of point
cut away for a couple of runs through point
dropped in the outfield, but a very tough chance for Mathews. Smith has advanced and lifted this one over mid-off, Mathews runs around and dives, just gets his hands to it
flicked through mid-on
driven through the off side for a single.
pushed away off the back foot through point
crunched away through the off side again
fullish on the pads, and White manages to pick out one of the three men on the boundary, at deep square leg
Smith backs off and tries to slog that over cover, but doesn't connect properly
short and pulled through midwicket, again it's found one of the three men in the deep
my goodness, that slower yorker is utterly confusing these batsmen, and Malinga has just missed off stump again
flicked to midwicket, can't beat the field
another good ball, fullish outside off, Smith can only drive it down to mid-on
there's a stroke of luck for Smith, he's backed away and got a thick edge past short third man, the slow outfield allows the fielder to chase it down but the batsmen do well to make that into three
gone! White goes the old heave-ho over midwicket, doesn't connect and Kulasekara has crashed that into off stump
edged away past Sangakkara, and that's run away to third man - that would usually easily reach the boundary, but this slow outfield has pulled it up yet again
great shot from Smith, at last! He's got a half-volley outside off and opens up his front leg, lifts a powerful drive over extra cover for the first boundary in nine overs
crunched that one, but straight to the man at deep point, that was flying like a rocket
another edge from Johnson, inside edge this time, that flies away past the stumps
slower short ball this time from Malinga, it doesn't get up much though and Johnson's edge bounces through to a diving Sangakkara
again, the slower ball, this time Johnson looks to pull and sees the ball sail over middle stump
fast bouncer this time! Johnson ducks under it safely enough
another bouncer, Johnson ducks it again
short ball again at 130kph, Johnson pulls this one in the air through midwicket
fullish ball at 131kph, Smith turns it through midwicket
Perera tries the slower ball this time, Smith waits on that one and drags it through midwicket for a couple of runs. That was almost a legbreak
slower again, Smith tries to crunch through point and can't beat the field
another legcutter slower ball, Smith backs away and cuts it through point

full and wide of off, Johnson has a swing at that and Perera and Sangakkara go up in unison for a caught behind, but that didn't look like an edge - maybe there was a noise we couldn't hear, but not sure why they appealed so strongly.
punched through cover for a run
yet another slower bouncer, Smith turns it around square leg
fullish and wide of off, Smith crunches the bat down on that and gets a single to point
good shot from Johnson, it's fullish on leg stump and he flicks it wide of midwicket
shorter ball is pulled by Johnson in the air over mid-on, there's a man down at long-on but it bounces safely short of him
bouncer, Johnson goes the hook and doesn't connect
full toss on the pads, Johnson flicks it over square leg and the man in the deep mops up
good yorker on line, but Johnson digs it out to drive to mid-on
good shot from Johnson, Randiv dragged down a short ball and Johnson waited on it, smashed a pull through midwicket and importantly found the gap
monstrously big six from Johnson! He's got down on one knee to slog-sweep that over midwicket - massive shot! That reminds me of how he was treating Paul Harris in his 96 at the Wanderers last year

oh, what wonderful fielding from Jayawardene! Johnson has crunched that to extra cover and Mahela does well to snap that up, and in a flash, throws quickly to the bowler, who whips the bails off with Johnson just short
Smith advance, but turns that ball into a yorker and can only dig it out back to Randiv
ah, Randiv gets his man, Smith dances down the pitch and Randiv beats the bat with a quicker ball, Sangakkara has no trouble whipping the bails off with Smith way out of his ground
turned to midwicket, can't find a gap
Hauritz backs away and slaps a slower ball over wide midwicket, it lands safely between the two men in the deep
sprays this one wide of off, no question about that one being called wide, it was unreachable
yorker length, Hauritz drives back past the bowler
not a bad shot from McKay there, he's picked up a low full toss, almost a yorker, and lifted it on the bounce to long-on
wild, windy swipe outside off there, and what's happened here? They've taken a sneaky bye after Sangakkara tossed the ball back towards the bowler
full and wide of off, Hauritz gets a thick inside edge back past the stumps
half-volley and he's lucky to get away with that, McKay tries to drive over cover and gets a thick edge down to third man
McKay advances and turns that into a full toss, gets it away through cover
the ninth wicket is down - Hauritz went the slog over midwicket, as he had to do, and it's skied off the leading edge to long-on, where Perera takes the catch
pushed down to long-on for a single
pulled down to long-on and they scamper back for two
backs right off from this one and punches it through cover
goes for the pull, comes off the toe of the bat and it's collected at long-on
off the pads towards square leg
Siddle gives himself plenty of room, Malinga bangs it in short and it sails over the stumps through to Sangakkara
Siddle gets under this one and drives over cover
there's the win, and the series! Malinga bowls McKay with a slower yorker
